messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: SSSM'sss are gay we are going to ussse Excercissse bikesss from now on

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Counter Intelligence

Cargo: The syndicate are trying to infiltrate your station. If you let them hijack your cargo shuttle, you'll save us a headache.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Letsss replace the SSSM with excercissse bikesss

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I did it for the reasssonsss

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Primary Tool Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Bridge.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.
